Pearland.Glenda Dawson High School: Glenda Dawson High School (DHS) is a public high school in Pearland, Texas (United States)It is a part of the Pearland Independent School District serving grades 9 through 12. In 2014, the school was awarded a national rank of 1,165th by U.S. News & World Report, which puts it in the silver medal category. U.S. News & World Report also ranks it 120th in Texas.
